goal:
开发一个简单的计算器程序，要求：
    1. 实现加减乘除四个基本运算
    2. 编写完整的单元测试
    3. 运行测试，确保测试通过
    4. 文件保存在calculator.py

rules.name: Initialize Project Structure
rules.condition: Project directory does not exist or is empty
rules.action: Create project directory and initialize necessary files including calculator.py
rules.expected_outcome: Project directory and initial files are created

rules.name: Implement Basic Calculator Functions
rules.condition: calculator.py exists and is empty or contains only initial code
rules.action: Implement add, subtract, multiply, and divide functions in calculator.py
rules.expected_outcome: calculator.py contains all four basic arithmetic functions

rules.name: Write Unit Tests
rules.condition: calculator.py contains all four basic arithmetic functions
rules.action: Write unit tests for each arithmetic function in a separate test file
rules.expected_outcome: Unit tests are written and ready to be executed

rules.name: Run Unit Tests
rules.condition: Unit tests are written and ready to be executed
rules.action: Execute the unit tests to verify the correctness of the arithmetic functions
rules.expected_outcome: All unit tests pass, confirming the correctness of the arithmetic functions

rules.name: Finalize and Review
rules.action: Review the code and tests for any potential improvements or optimizations
rules.expected_outcome: Code and tests are finalized and ready for deployment or further development
